frameset.edef: to hope for, to ask for

example.parse: (TOP (S (CONJ فَ) (VP (IV1P+IV نِرجو) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP مِن) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON مَن)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يذكر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هَذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الأُمْنِيَّة))))))) (SBAR (SBAR (SUB_CONJ أَنْ) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV يشاور) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PP (PREP لَ) (NP (PRON_1P نا))) (PP-CLR (PREP عَلَى) (NP (NP (NP (DEM_PRON_MS هَذا)) (NP (DET+NOUN القَرار))) (SBAR (WHNP-2 (REL_PRON الَّذِي)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS اِخْتَفَى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (PP (PREP فِي) (NP (NOUN ظُرُوف) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG غامضَة)))))))))))

arg.g: from whom that remember this wish
to point at for us to the decision that disappeard

example.arg: ان يشاور لنا على هذا القرار الذي اختفى
